scripts.package: pnpm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../chrome-virtual-keyboard.zip . -x ".DS_Store"
scripts.test: pnpm run test:unit && pnpm run test:e2e
scripts.coverage:unit: rm -rf coverage-unit && pnpm exec vitest run --coverage
scripts.coverage:e2e: rm -rf coverage-e2e .coverage-data && COVERAGE=1 pnpm exec playwright test && node scripts/merge-coverage.js
scripts.coverage:all: rm -rf coverage coverage-unit coverage-e2e .coverage-data && pnpm run coverage:unit && COVERAGE=1 COVERAGE_SKIP_REPORT=1 pnpm exec playwright test && node scripts/merge-coverage.js
